async function generateMorningBriefing() {
  const briefing = {

/**
 * Assess energy level based on time
 */
function assessEnergyLevel() {
  const hour = new Date().getHours();
  
  if (hour < 9) {
    return { level: 'HIGH', time: 'Morning', recommendation: 'Tackle biggest tasks now' };
  } else if (hour < 14) {
    return { level: 'MEDIUM', time: 'Afternoon', recommendation: 'Collaborative work and meetings' };
  } else if (hour < 18) {
    return { level: 'MEDIUM', time: 'Late Afternoon', recommendation: 'Wrap up and prepare for tomorrow' };
  } else {
    return { level: 'LOW', time: 'Evening', recommendation: 'Reflection and light tasks' };
  }
}

/**
 * Recommend daily focus based on day
 */
function recommendDailyFocus() {
  const day = new Date().getDay();
  const dayNames = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'];
  const focusThemes = {
    'Monday': 'Start strong, set weekly pace',
    'Tuesday': 'Deep work and momentum',
    'Wednesday': 'Mid-week push',
    'Thursday': 'Wrap up week strong',
    'Friday': 'Complete and prepare',
    'Saturday': 'Creative projects',
    'Sunday': 'Rest and reflection'
  };
  
  return {
    theme: focusThemes[dayNames[day]],
    priority: 'Review top task from plans',
    avoid: 'Distractions and meetings'
  };
}

/**
 * Get motivational quote
 */
function getMotivationalQuote() {
  const quotes = [
    "Fear does not exist in this dojo. Start strong today.",
    "First strike, then strike hard. Today is your day.",
    "Victory is not given. It is taken. Take it today.",
    "The student who rises early conquers the day.",
    "Walk on road. Your path starts now.",
    "Every champion was once a beginner who didn't quit."
  ];
  
  return quotes[Math.floor(Math.random() * quotes.length)];
}
